entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
